skill.name: Spectre Step
skill.description:
Dyrroth deals (+275% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to the target and restores (+190% Total Physical ATK) HP.
Passive: After every 3 Basic ATK(s), Dyrroth's next Basic ATK releases a Circle Strike that deals (+150% Total Physical ATK) DMG.

skill.name: Law and Order
skill.description:
Hylos deals (+260% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to the target and gains a Shield for 3s.
Passive: When battle starts, grants a 150 Shield to himself and adjacent allies.

skill.name: Bloody Hunt
skill.description:
Franco launches an iron hook towards the furthest enemy, dealing (+120% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG and dragging them back.
He then deals (+100% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG 6 times to surrounding enemies.

skill.name: Warmonger
skill.description:
Enhances Argus' next Basic ATK to launch a Demonic Slash, dealing (+170% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG twice.
Passive: On taking fatal damage for the first time, Argus becomes Fallen Angel, gains 40% ATK Speed for 3s and is immune to death for 1 s.

skill.name: Strafe
skill.description:
Irithel launches flaming arrows, dealing (+135% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG and empowering the next 3 Basic ATKs.
Enhanced Basic ATKs deal (+320% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG.
Passive: Each Basic ATK deals 3 hits of (+35% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG.

skill.name: Planets Attack
skill.description:
Cyclops summons 5 starlit spheres that orbit him, each dealing (+140% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to nearby enemies.
Passive: Grants 10% Hybrid ATK to two allied Heroes within 1 tile.

skill.name: I Need You, Kupa!
skill.description:
Popol prays intently to call Kupa to the battlefield, who will leave in 4s.
After 3 consecutive attacks, Kupa unleashes 3 rapid blows, each dealing (+135% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG.

skill.name: Valkyrie
skill.description: Freya enters the Valkyrie state, gaining 35% Physical ATK, 30% ATK Speed, and a 700 shield. Meanwhile, her Basic ATKs deal 25% Splash DMG.

skill.name: Wild Power
skill.description: Masha increases the DMG for the next 8 Basic ATKs to 150%, gaining 85% extra ATK Speed and 10% Hybrid Lifesteal.

skill.name: Annihilate
skill.description: Passive: Atlas generates Frigid Breath around him. Enemies in the area will have their ATK Speed reduced by 1% every 0.5s (up to 5%).

skill.name: Hailstone Blast
skill.description:
Aurora summons an icy meteorite to strike at the location with the most enemies, dealing Magic DMG 6 times within medium range.
When reaching 3-Star, she summons a freezing wind that deals high Magic DMG to all enemies.

skill.name: Void Blast
skill.description: Yve channels Galactic Energy, dealing Magic DMG to the target, then detonates this energy, dealing Magic DMG to enemies on adjacent tiles.

skill.name: Body Slam
skill.description: Akai slams the ground, dealing (+260% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to adjacent enemies while gaining a Shield equal to a flat value + % of Max HP.

skill.name: Tempest of Blades
skill.description: Ling soars skyward, becoming invincible. Upon landing, deals (+290% Total Physical ATK) DMG to enemies within medium range.

skill.name: Soul Sever
skill.description: Suyou deals (+300% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of him.

skill.name: Tiger Pace
skill.description:
Enemy Heroes hit by Wanwan’s ATKs 3 times will have their weaknesses exposed. Wanwan’s Basic ATKs deal an extra (+65% Total Physical ATK) DMG. 
Passive: enemies with exposed weakness become Vulnerable, taking 10% extra DMG.

skill.name: Clone Techniques
skill.description:
Upon first skill cast, Sun summons 2 clones that take 75% extra DMG. (Magic Crystals are ineffective on Doppelgangers, and a maximum of 2 Doppelgangers can exist at the same time.)
In subsequent casts, Sun and the Doppelgangers strike forward with their staves, dealing (+180% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to enemies within 3 tiles along the path.

skill.name: Starmoon Shockwave
skill.description: Chang'e sends 5 energy spheres toward the target, each dealing (+155% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG. The spheres will spread out when they hit the target and continue to fly, dealing damage to enemies behind the target.

skill.name: Chivalry Fist
skill.description:
Badang’s every 4 Basic ATK(s) will enhance the next Basic ATK to deal (+420% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG and gain a 100 Shield.
Passive: When battle starts, Badang grants 6 Hybrid DEF to himself and the allied Heroes to his left and right.

skill.name: Ring of Order
skill.description: Kaja releases a Ringed Electric Blade that quickly expands and contracts, dealing (+130% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to enemies hit and restoring (+25% Total Magic ATK) HP to himself.

skill.name: Cyclone Sweep
skill.description: Balmond launches 14 strikes within 3 s, each dealing (+45% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to adjacent enemies and reducing their healing received by 30 %.

skill.name: Molten Scythes
skill.description: Thamuz throws War Scythe toward the current target direction and recalls it, dealing (+230% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to enemies hit in the 3 front tile(s) and stunning them for 0.6 s.

skill.name: Spear of Destruction
skill.description: Moskov throws Spear of Destruction toward the location with the most enemies. The spear deals (+285% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to enemies in its path, and Moskov’s ATK Speed is increased by 20 % for 6 s.

skill.name: Mystic Gush
skill.description: Gord continuously unleashes an energy beam in a designated direction, dealing (+170% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG 12 time(s) to enemies in its path. (If no target can be attacked, casting immediately ends and refunds some Mana.)

skill.name: Minoan Fury
skill.description: Minotaur hammers the ground 3 times, sending shockwaves that deal (+90%Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to enemies within a large area and reduces their Movement Speed by 70% for 2s for the first two strikes. The final shockwave deals (+180%Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG and knocks targets airborne for 0.5s. Minotaur is immune to CC while casting this skill. For 5s after casting this skill, Minotaur will recover 2% HP when he takes damage.

skill.name: Decimation
skill.description: Martis deals (+270%Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to the target and gains a Shield equal to 10% of his Max HP for 3s. Passive: When casting the skill for the first time, grants the entire lineup 10% ATK Speed for 6s.

skill.name: Elusiveness
skill.description: Upon first skill cast, Karina dashes to the enemy Hero with the highest damage output within 3 tiles (prioritizes ranged Heroes) and enters the Elusiveness state for 2s, during which she is immune to 5 Basic ATKs received. Passive: After attacking a target twice in a row, Karina's third attack deals an extra (+250%Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to the target.

skill.name: Nightmaric Spawn
skill.description: Zhask summons a Nightmaric Spawn next to him that will automatically attack nearby enemies, dealing (+130% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG with each attack. These attacks also reduce the target's Magic DEF by 6, stacking up to 4 times.

skill.name: Blue Nova
skill.description: Odette releases a set of magic energy balls that deal (+500% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to the target enemy and one nearby enemy when hit, immobilizing them for 0.8s.

skill.name: Power of Chaos: Darkening
skill.description: Lunox dashes to a safe location and releases 3 Chaos Assaults, each dealing (+270% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG. Killing an enemy Hero grants 1 additional cast of Chaos Assault.

skill.name: Impact Wrench
skill.description: Johnson throws his Impact Wrench at his current target, dealing (+560% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG and gaining a Shield equal to 25% of Max HP that lasts 4s.

skill.name: Auto Alarm Bomb
skill.description: Diggie throws an owl alarm clock at the current target, dealing (+300% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to enemies on adjacent tiles and reducing their Magic DEF by 12.

skill.name: Noumenon Energy Core
skill.description: Lolita grants herself and two allied Heroes a 320 Shield that lasts 3s.

skill.name: Fracture
skill.description: Nolan dashes to the farthest enemy within nearby 3 tiles, leaving a Rift and dealing (+220% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG. After a short delay, the Rift activates and deals (+220% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG, then Nolan moves to a nearby tile.

skill.name: Void Projectile
skill.description: Layla fires an orb of Malefic Energy at the target, dealing (+180% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to the target and stunning them for 0.5s. Passive: When the battle begins, increase the Physical ATK of herself and the allies to her right and left by 15%.

skill.name: Superposition
skill.description: Natan launches a projectile with Basic ATK, dealing (+90% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to enemies in its path. The projectiles will return after Natan casts the skill, increasing 10% all DMG dealt to enemies by him.

skill.name: Contract: Transform
skill.description: Aldous unleashes his inner energy to enhance his next Basic ATK, dealing (+340% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to the target and gaining (+100% Total Physical ATK) Shield.

skill.name: Penalty Zone
skill.description: Terizla leaps up and slams down forcefully, dealing (+240% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to adjacent enemies and knocking them Airborne for 0.6s, while gaining a Shield equal to 16% of his Max HP for 4s.

skill.name: Ionic Edge
skill.description: Uranus releases two energy blades that orbit around himself, dealing (+250% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to enemies while gaining 60 Hybrid DEF for 4s.

skill.name: Shadowblade Slaughter
skill.description:
Gusion throws daggers forward, each dealing (+50% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to the target hit. Then he recalls the daggers, dealing the same Magic DMG.
Passive: Dealing DMG reduces the target's Hybrid DEF by 6.

skill.name: Eternal Guard
skill.description: Vexana summons the Eternal Guard to ravage the battlefield, dealing (+315% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to enemies within medium range and knocking them airborne for 0.6s. The Eternal Guard's Basic ATKs deal (+175% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG.

skill.name: Wind Blade
skill.description:
Vale unleashes 2 wind blades towards the left and right of a target area, dealing (+300% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to enemies hit.
At the start of battle, Vale grants 10 Mana to himself and his left and right allies.

skill.name: Force Swing
skill.description: Alpha unleashes 2 sweeping slashes in a fan-shaped area in the front, dealing (+120% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to enemies. From the third cast onward, additionally releases 3 linear energy waves forward at different angles, each dealing (+85% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG.

skill.name: Deadly Stinger
skill.description: Helcurt blinks to the enemy Hero with the highest damage output within 3 tiles (prioritizes ranged Heroes) upon first skill cast, and then fires 5 Deadly Stinger(s) forward, each dealing (+110% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG to enemies. Passive: Upon death, Helcurt spreads a curse, increasing damage taken by adjacent enemies by 15% for the next 8s.

skill.name: Grenade Bombardment
skill.description: Clint launches a grenade in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing (+300% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG.

skill.name: Dispersion
skill.description: Luo Yi releases the skill in the target direction, dealing (+540% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to the first enemy hit and those behind them in a fan-shaped area.

skill.name: Super Magic
skill.description: Guinevere launches an enhanced Basic ATK, dealing (+420% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to the target and recovering (+110% Total Magic ATK) HP.

skill.name: Stardust Dance
skill.description: Esmeralda deals (+170% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG and (+170% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to surrounding enemies. Passive: When dealing DMG, Esmeralda grants enemy Heroes a Shield equal to 100% of DMG dealt and gradually steals their Shield. Her basic ATK deals (+50% Total Physical ATK) and (+50% Total Magic ATK). Esmeralda's DMG ignores all shield effects.

skill.name: Puppet-on-a-String
skill.description: Angela launches a string that connects to the target, reducing their Hybrid DEF (up to 36). If still connected after 0.8s, deals (+900% Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG.

skill.name: Black Dragon Form
skill.description: Yu Zhong transforms into his Black Dragon Form for up to 5s, gaining 50% DMG Reduction and dealing (+220% Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG while rampaging through enemy Heroes. Gains 25% ATK Speed until the end of battle, and subsequent skills slash enemies within 2 tiles, dealing (+150 % Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG. (Both rampage and slash DMG count as Basic ATK DMG.)

skill.name: Ougi: Shadow Kill
skill.description: Hayabusa turns into a shadow and strikes enemies in range, dealing a total of (+945 % Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG over several hits.

skill.name: Rhapsody
skill.description: Granger rapidly fires 3 shots at the target, each dealing (+180 % Total Physical ATK) Physical DMG.

skill.name: Seimei Umbrella Open
skill.description: Kagura unleashes 3 Seimei Umbrella(s), dealing (+550 % Total Magic ATK) Magic DMG to enemies in their path.
